backend/main.mo: Defines core social-media backend types and state for users, posts, stories, messages, notifications, and announcements with mixin-based storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Lists evidence mapping files and components to a deployment promotion feature with high-confidence verification metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend source files.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documentation detailing how to promote draft builds to live, manage service worker cache versions, and verify deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color tokens, dark-mode variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, PWA manifest links, icons, and mounting the root app script.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, start URL, theme colors, and icon assets.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker handling caching, versioning, activation, and offline fallback behavior for the PWA.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app router defining authenticated routes, shell layout, and startup logic integration.
frontend/src/components/announcements/An: Component that fetches and displays the latest announcement inside a styled glass card.
frontend/src/components/posts/CommentsDr: Renders a side drawer to view and submit comments on a post, including comment input, listing, and author info fetching.
frontend/src/components/posts/CreatePost: Provides a dialog for creating posts with text and optional media upload, including previews and upload progress.
Floating action button that triggers opening the create-post dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/FeedList.t: Fetches and displays the list of posts with loading, error, empty states, and a refresh option.
Displays image or video media with loading skeletons and auto-play controls for videos.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Shows an individual post with author info, content, media, like/delete actions, and comments drawer.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Dialog for editing user profile fields and uploading a new profile picture with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Modal form for creating a story with caption, image upload, preview, and upload progress using useCreateStory.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoriesR: Displays a horizontally scrollable list of story bubbles grouped by author and includes a create-story button.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: Class-based error boundary that shows a styled fallback UI and allows resetting to the home page.
frontend/src/components/system/GlassSurf: Reusable glass-style container components with variant-based styling for default, card, and navigation surfaces.
frontend/src/components/system/NavIcon.t: Renders an image-based nav icon with automatic fallback to lucide-react icons if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/system/PageState: Common UI states including loading indicator, error card with retry, empty state, and card skeleton placeholders.
frontend/src/components/system/PageTrans: Wraps page content with a fade‑in animation keyed to the current route path.
frontend/src/components/system/RoleBadge: Displays animated badges for admin or owner roles using themed colors and icons.
frontend/src/components/system/SplashScr: Full‑screen animated splash screen with gradient effects, logo, and app branding.
frontend/src/components/system/StartupSc: Shows app startup progress with phase‑specific icons and labels, plus an error screen with retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient creation and exposes identity state to the app.
frontend/src/hooks/usePatchedActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current identity using react-query and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes. Falls back to an anonymous actor when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines reusable react-query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, admin status, search results, and other backend data using the patched actor. Handles authentication state, retries, and conditional query enabling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines a premium dark-theme design system with custom colors, gradients, and glassmorphism utility classes.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: Renders the main app layout with navigation, user profile data, unread notifications, and periodic last‑seen updates. Builds navigation items dynamically using the authenticated identity.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it in react-query and Internet Identity providers. Loads global styles and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/access/AccessCodeGate: Implements an access code gate UI that validates a code before unlocking the app. Handles form input, error display, and unlocking logic.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing user and post management tools, activity stats, and announcement creation using various backend mutations.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Auth gate that switches between login, signup, or profile setup based on identity and fetched user profile state.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login page using Internet Identity with status handling and navigation after successful authentication.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: Profile setup form that submits user details to the backend and redirects after creating a profile.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup page that triggers Internet Identity login and shows errors or loading state.
frontend/src/pages/home/HomePage.tsx: Home page showing the feed and a button to open the create‑post dialog.
frontend/src/pages/messages/Conversation: Conversation view that loads messages with a user, marks them read, and allows sending new messages.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesPage: Messages list showing conversations and navigating to specific conversation threads.
frontend/src/pages/notifications/Notific: Displays user notifications, supports marking them as read, and shows loading skeletons or an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Renders a multi-step onboarding slideshow with images, navigation, and a final completion action.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfilePage.t: Loads and displays a user's profile and posts, with edit options for the owner and role badges for admins/owners.
frontend/src/pages/search/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a debounced search for users, showing loading states, results, or a no‑matches message and linking to profiles or messages.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SettingsPage: Shows user settings including profile, theme, logout, admin role management, and app lock controls.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoriesPage.t: Lists active stories, allows creating a new story, and navigates to individual story views with a loading state.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoryViewerPa: Full-screen story viewer that cycles through active stories with progress bars, navigation, and author info.
frontend/src/utils/accessCodeGate.ts: Manages app access lock state in localStorage and validates a fixed access code.
frontend/src/utils/onboarding.ts: Tracks whether onboarding has been completed using localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/pwa.ts: Registers a service worker, handles updates, and forces reloads when new workers activate.
frontend/src/utils/startup.ts: Provides startup phase tracking, timeout helpers, and error logging/classification utilities.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats timestamps and last‑seen values and checks if a user is considered online.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, shadows, and responsive utilities.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing deployment workflow, feature requests, and versioning state.
